pullrequest.title: Update windows build tutorial.  Needed some additional steps.

content.raw:
1. Need to highlight that windows compile does not work yet.
1. Ignittion Math required Ignition Cmake.  Added Mercurial command to clone it, and steps to configure and build it.
1. Note the Ignition configure.bat scripts include the steps to create and change to the build directory, so these are not required as separate steps

I am experimenting with Microsoft vcpkg utility https://github.com/Microsoft/vcpkg as a better way to fetch and build dependencies.  Seems to work well so far.  If I succeed I can contribute appropriate instructions here.
content.html:
1. Need to highlight that windows compile does not work yet.
  2. Ignittion Math required Ignition Cmake. Added Mercurial command to clone it, and steps to configure and build it.
  3. Note the Ignition configure.bat scripts include the steps to create and change to the build directory, so these are not required as separate steps

I am experimenting with Microsoft vcpkg utility https://github.com/Microsoft/vcpkg as a better way to fetch and build dependencies. Seems to work well so far. If I succeed I can contribute appropriate instructions here.

pullrequest.title: Update windows build tutorial.  Needed some additional steps.

content.raw:
Thanks for this! We definitely need to update the tutorials as we're going through a transition right now.

I think it's a little too early to have users adopt `ign-cmake`, so a smaller step forward might be warranted. Right now I'm putting together an alternative fix for this that involves checking out the `ign-math3` branch of `ign-math` so that `ign-cmake` isn't needed at all. I'll post an update when that PR is ready. The instructions in this PR may still be very useful down the road, once we're ready to fully deploy `ign-cmake`, so we should definitely hang onto this, or redirect it to another branch until we're ready to merge it into `default`.

Also, we've discussed using `vcpkg`, and we're very interested in its potential. We've been preoccupied with other development concerns lately, so any advice or contributions you can offer to help us adopt `vcpkg` would be very appreciated.
content.html:
Thanks for this! We definitely need to update the tutorials as we're going through a transition right now.

I think it's a little too early to have users adopt ign-cmake, so a smaller step forward might be warranted. Right now I'm putting together an alternative fix for this that involves checking out the ign-math3 branch of ign-math so that ign-cmake isn't needed at all. I'll post an update when that PR is ready. The instructions in this PR may still be very useful down the road, once we're ready to fully deploy ign-cmake, so we should definitely hang onto this, or redirect it to another branch until we're ready to merge it into default.

Also, we've discussed using vcpkg, and we're very interested in its potential. We've been preoccupied with other development concerns lately, so any advice or contributions you can offer to help us adopt vcpkg would be very appreciated.

pullrequest.title: Update windows build tutorial.  Needed some additional steps.

content.raw: Reviewing the changes in this PR I think that the best approach would be to create new tutorials for gazebo11/gazebo10 with updated dependencies. The gazebo9 tutorial needs some updates I’ll send a new PR for them.
